Runit

Services

  • All system services:
    • /etc/sv/*
  • Manageable services:
    • /var/service/*
  • Service structure of /etc/sv/<SERVICE>/:
    • ./run - executable shell script run when service starts (required)
    • ./finish - executable shell script run when service exits (optional)
    • ./down - empty text file, prevents starting script automatically (optional)

Service Management

Enable/Disable

  • Enable and <start/don't start> service automatically:

    # <touch|rm> /etc/sv/<SERVICE>/down
# ln -s /etc/sv/<SERVICE>/ /var/service/

  • Disable service:

    # rm /var/service/<SERVICE>

Manual Management

  • Start:
    • With restart on stop:

      # sv (u)p <SERVICE>

    • Without restart on stop:

      # sv (o)nce <SERVICE>

  • Check:
    • Specific service:

      # sv (s)tatus <SERVICE>

    • All manageable services:

      # sv (s)tatus /var/service/*

  • Stop:
    • Nicely:

      # sv (d)own <SERVICE>

    • Forcefully:

      # sv (k)ill <SERVICE>
